{"name": "Kingdom Life Christian Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "-We ask that if you don't speak English that you have a way to interpret it in your language. 
-Current PA State I.D.
-Proof of address
- Closed during inclement weather on the day of distribution and resume the following Wednesday
- Open every second and fourth Wednesday of the month", "email": "", "url": "https://kingdomlifechristiancenter.snappages.site/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6325 Frankford Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Tacony", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19135", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.02776679999999, "longitude": -75.0588362}, "phones": [{"number": "(267) 343-5183", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "State ID required"}]}
